import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { SERVER_URL } from '../settings' export default function ProfileListItem(props) { const profile = props.profile const myProfile = props.myProfile return (
  • {profile.first_name} {profile.last_name}

    @{profile.user.username}

    {profile.bio}
    • ) }
